title: silver 2 adc looking for support main to duo w/
body:
Champs i use in rank:
Ezreal
Lucian
Cait
Jhin
Draven
Tristana

replies.body:
Hi! I'm currently Silver V
I just added you. Maybe we can play when we get the time or something.
I am a support main, looking for a patient and nice adc . 

I can only play 3 supp champs atm:
{{champion:37}}  {{champion:267}}  {{champion:40}} 


Need to practice:
{{champion:89}}  {{champion:99}} {{champion:16}} 

Sometimes i can make plays but i prefer my adc to tell me what to do such as when to ult, if he's ready etc. not to go too aggro, you know? the basics?
Just sometimes i get flamed and ends up dying because my adc doesnt follow up or he goes in without me xD

I cant really play tanky supports but im trying to learn them :)

heya there Muffinman,
My ign is Lyanna Mormont and I am a support main that is currently in Silver 3 (but has been moving between here and S1 for the last couple of months)
I can pretty much play any support that fits the situation and I am eager to get to gold by the end of the season and would love to have an adc main that I could duo with and learn with.
